content: Grieving over Defeat in Battle, and Prayer for Help.

For the music director; according to Shushan Eduth. A Mikhtam of David, to teach; when he fought with Aram-naharaim and Aram-zobah, and Joab returned, and killed twelve thousand of Edom in the Valley of Salt.
You have been angry; restore us!
You have made the land quake, You have split it open;
Heal its cracks, for it sways.
You have made Your people experience hardship;
You have given us wine to drink that makes us stagger.
You have given a banner to those who fear You,
That it may be displayed because of the truth.
That Your beloved may be rescued,
Save  with Your right hand, and answer us!
